columns.name: payment_crypto_network
columns.comment: Red de la criptomoneda (TRC20, ERC20, BEP20, etc.)

columns.name: payment_crypto_currency
columns.comment: Tipo de criptomoneda (USDT, BTC, ETH, etc.)

columns.name: start_datetime
columns.comment: Fecha y hora de inicio del quiz

columns.name: end_datetime
columns.comment: Fecha y hora de fin del quiz

columns.name: results_publish_datetime
columns.comment: Fecha y hora de publicación de resultados

columns.name: processed_no_response
columns.comment: Flag para indicar si se procesaron estudiantes sin respuesta

columns.name: no_response_reason
columns.comment: Razón por la cual no se respondió el quiz (ej: tiempo expirado, quiz vencido)

columns.name: force_password_change
columns.comment: Indica si el usuario debe cambiar su contraseña

columns.name: password_change_token
columns.comment: Token único para cambio de contraseña

views.name: courses_enrollment_status
views.definition: select `c`.`id` AS `id`,`c`.`title` AS `title`,`c`.`identifier` AS `identifier`,`c`.`status` AS `status`,`c`.`enrollment_end_date` AS `enrollment_end_date`,`c`.`enrollment_start_date` AS `enrollment_start_date`,`c`.`slug` AS `slug`,`c`.`description` AS `description`,`c`.`short_description` AS `short_description`,`c`.`category_id` AS `category_id`,`c`.`level` AS `level`,`c`.`duration_hours` AS `duration_hours`,`c`.`duration_minutes` AS `duration_minutes`,`c`.`price` AS `price`,`c`.`is_free` AS `is_free`,`c`.`thumbnail_url` AS `thumbnail_url`,`c`.`video_url` AS `video_url`,`c`.`content` AS `content`,`c`.`requirements` AS `requirements`,`c`.`learning_objectives` AS `learning_objectives`,`c`.`is_published` AS `is_published`,`c`.`is_featured` AS `is_featured`,`c`.`sort_order` AS `sort_order`,`c`.`created_at` AS `created_at`,`c`.`updated_at` AS `updated_at`,`c`.`instructor_id` AS `instructor_id`,case when `c`.`status` = 'culminado' then 'Culminado' when `c`.`status` = 'cancelado' then 'Cancelado' when `c`.`status` = 'borrador' then 'Borrador' when current_timestamp() < `c`.`enrollment_start_date` then 'Inscripciones Próximas' when current_timestamp() between `c`.`enrollment_start_date` and `c`.`enrollment_end_date` then 'Inscripciones Abiertas' when current_timestamp() > `c`.`enrollment_end_date` then 'Inscripciones Cerradas' else 'Estado Desconocido' end AS `enrollment_status`,case when `c`.`status` = 'culminado' then 'success' when `c`.`status` = 'cancelado' then 'danger' when `c`.`status` = 'borrador' then 'secondary' when current_timestamp() < `c`.`enrollment_start_date` then 'warning' when current_timestamp() between `c`.`enrollment_start_date` and `c`.`enrollment_end_date` then 'success' when current_timestamp() > `c`.`enrollment_end_date` then 'danger' else 'secondary' end AS `status_color` from `bitcanc_usuarios`.`courses` `c`

views.name: course_instructors_view
views.definition: select `c`.`id` AS `course_id`,`c`.`title` AS `course_title`,`c`.`identifier` AS `course_identifier`,group_concat(concat(`u`.`name`,' (',`ci`.`role`,')') order by `ci`.`is_lead_instructor` DESC,`u`.`name` ASC separator ', ') AS `instructors`,count(`ci`.`instructor_id`) AS `total_instructors`,max(case when `ci`.`is_lead_instructor` = 1 then `u`.`name` end) AS `lead_instructor` from ((`bitcanc_usuarios`.`courses` `c` left join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`course_instructors` `ci` on(`c`.`id` = `ci`.`course_id`)) left join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`users` `u` on(`ci`.`instructor_id` = `u`.`id`)) group by `c`.`id`,`c`.`title`,`c`.`identifier`

views.name: course_stats
views.definition: select `c`.`id` AS `id`,`c`.`title` AS `title`,`c`.`category_id` AS `category_id`,`cc`.`name` AS `category_name`,`c`.`level` AS `level`,`c`.`duration_hours` AS `duration_hours`,count(distinct `uc`.`user_id`) AS `enrolled_students`,count(distinct case when `uc`.`completed` = 1 then `uc`.`user_id` end) AS `completed_students`,avg(`uc`.`progress`) AS `avg_progress`,count(distinct `cert`.`id`) AS `certificates_issued` from (((`bitcanc_usuarios`.`courses` `c` left join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`course_categories` `cc` on(`c`.`category_id` = `cc`.`id`)) left join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`user_courses` `uc` on(`c`.`id` = `uc`.`course_id`)) left join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`certificates` `cert` on(`c`.`id` = `cert`.`course_id`)) where `c`.`is_published` = 1 group by `c`.`id`

views.name: user_progress
views.definition: select `u`.`id` AS `user_id`,`u`.`name` AS `name`,`u`.`email` AS `email`,count(distinct `uc`.`course_id`) AS `total_courses`,count(distinct case when `uc`.`completed` = 1 then `uc`.`course_id` end) AS `completed_courses`,avg(`uc`.`progress`) AS `avg_progress`,sum(`c`.`duration_hours`) AS `total_hours`,count(distinct `cert`.`id`) AS `certificates_earned` from (((`bitcanc_usuarios`.`users` `u` left join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`user_courses` `uc` on(`u`.`id` = `uc`.`user_id`)) left join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`courses` `c` on(`uc`.`course_id` = `c`.`id`)) left join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`certificates` `cert` on(`u`.`id` = `cert`.`user_id`)) group by `u`.`id`

views.name: v_certificates_full
views.definition: select `c`.`id` AS `id`,`c`.`user_id` AS `user_id`,`c`.`course_id` AS `course_id`,`c`.`certificate_number` AS `certificate_number`,`c`.`issue_date` AS `issue_date`,`c`.`completion_date` AS `completion_date`,`c`.`status` AS `status`,`c`.`certificate_type` AS `certificate_type`,`c`.`certificate_url` AS `certificate_url`,`c`.`certificate_data` AS `certificate_data`,`c`.`issued_by` AS `issued_by`,`c`.`notes` AS `notes`,`c`.`created_at` AS `created_at`,`c`.`updated_at` AS `updated_at`,`c`.`is_received` AS `is_received`,`c`.`rating_id` AS `rating_id`,`c`.`metadata` AS `metadata`,`c`.`revoked_by` AS `revoked_by`,`c`.`revoked_at` AS `revoked_at`,`c`.`revoke_reason` AS `revoke_reason`,`c`.`expiry_date` AS `expiry_date`,`u`.`name` AS `student_name`,`u`.`email` AS `student_email`,`co`.`title` AS `course_title`,`co`.`identifier` AS `course_identifier`,`issued`.`name` AS `issued_by_name`,`revoked`.`name` AS `revoked_by_name` from ((((`bitcanc_usuarios`.`certificates` `c` join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`users` `u` on(`c`.`user_id` = `u`.`id`)) join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`courses` `co` on(`c`.`course_id` = `co`.`id`)) left join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`users` `issued` on(`c`.`issued_by` = `issued`.`id`)) left join `bitcanc_usuarios`.`users` `revoked` on(`c`.`revoked_by` = `revoked`.`id`))
